SEARCH

Class Location

java.lang.Object
Location
public class Location extends Object
This class represents a location in the game world. It contains information about the location's name, description, items, hostility, events, and characters.
Author:
Ricky Nguyen

    • hasItem

      public boolean hasItem()
      Checks if the location contains an item.
      Returns:
      True if the location contains an item, false otherwise.

    • setHasItem

      public void setHasItem(boolean value)
      Sets whether the location contains an item.
      Parameters:
      value - True if the location contains an item, false otherwise.

    • getItemAtLoc

      public Items getItemAtLoc()
      Returns the item present in the location.
      Returns:
      The item in the location, or null if none.

    • setItem

      public void setItem(Items item)
      Sets the item present in the location. Also updates the hasItem flag accordingly.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to set, or null if no item.

    • isHostile

      public boolean isHostile()
      Checks if the location is hostile.
      Returns:
      True if the location is hostile, false otherwise.

    • setHostile

      public void setHostile(boolean value)
      Sets whether the location is hostile.
      Parameters:
      value - True if the location is hostile, false otherwise.

    • isEventTriggered

      public boolean isEventTriggered()
      Checks if a special event in the location has been triggered.
      Returns:
      True if the event has been triggered, false otherwise.

    • triggerEvent

      public void triggerEvent()
      Triggers the special event in the location.
